revised_title: The Mechanism of Bile Absorption and Pressure of Bile Secretion in Bile Duct Obstruction
tldr: This study investigates the pressure of bile secretion and the mechanism of bile absorption in animals with bile duct obstruction. The authors found that the average maximum pressure of bile secretion in cats was 304.4 mm, and in dogs, it was 300 mm. The research also discusses the methods employed to measure bile pressure and the potential factors affecting the results.
